Post: "Living with chronic pain is like being a prisoner in my own body. I'm trapped in a never-ending cycle of discomfort and agony, unable to escape the confines of my own mind. It's exhausting, both physically and mentally, and it's hard not to feel defeated when it feels like I'm fighting a losing battle. But I know I can't give up, no matter how hard it gets.
